kpi.name: mgw_1203a

kpi_info.title: Average of Acoustic Echo Cancellation in AoIP interface
kpi_info.use: Average value of simultaneously active Acoustic Echo Cancellation in AoIP interface in one Result Accumulation Period.
kpi_info.use_experience: Counter available since U4.2, but KPI introduced in Report only on U6.0

kpi.kpi_alias: Avg Acoust Echo Cancel AoIP If
